name: FATSO
description: Fatso Family is a dynamic community hub and a leading memecoin on the Casper Network, launched in Q2 2024. Backed by members of the Casper Association and a grantee in its funding program, Fatso Family is driving growth by expanding its Telegram App to over 300,000 users. The app integrates advanced DeFi tools, allowing for trading, staking, and the purchase of special features. Additionally, the project incorporates $CSPR token burns, enhancing its deflationary model and contributing to the Casper ecosystemâ€™s expansion
